title: Schleich Unveils Global Sustainability Initiative - The Toy Book
summary: James Zahn, known as The Rock Father, is an experienced editor in the toy industry and pop culture, overseeing several publications related to toys and entertainment. He has made numerous media appearances and has over 30 years of experience in entertainment, retail, and publishing. Zahn is also known for offering expert commentary in major publications and has been associated with Adventure Media & Events since 2016, progressing from advisory roles to Editor-in-Chief.
